item.title: YouTube (Playlists)
item.replacecode: <object width="$ameinfo[width]" height="$ameinfo[height]"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/p/$p1"></param><param name="background" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/p/$p1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="$ameinfo[width]" height="$ameinfo[height]" wmode="transparent"></embed></object>
